name: rx-postmessenger
author: Jeffrey Westerkamp
description: Minimal RxJS wrapper around the window.postMessage API for both passive (request-response) and active (notification) streams across frame windows.

scripts.publish:patch: npm run publish:pre && npm version patch && npm publish --access=public && git push
scripts.publish:minor: npm run publish:pre && npm version minor && npm publish --access=public && git push
scripts.publish:major: npm run publish:pre && npm version major && npm publish --access=public && git push
